verses.verse: And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> oxen <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>; and Balak <S%H1111><s%> and Balaam <S%H1109><s%> offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8690><s%> by thy burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and I will go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: peradventure the YY <S%H3068><s%> will come <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8735><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me: and whatsoever <S%H1697><s%> he sheweth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me I will tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee. And he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to an high place <S%H8205><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8735><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, I have prepared <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and I have offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon every altar <S%H4196><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in Balaam's <S%H1109><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and thus thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.
And he returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, and, lo, he stood <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> by his burnt sacrifice <S%H5930><s%>, he, and all the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>.

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his parable <S%H4912><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Balak <S%H1111><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> hath brought <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me from Aram <S%H758><s%>, out of the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%>, saying, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, curse <S%H779><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, defy <S%H2194><s%> <S%H8798><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

How <S%H4100><s%> shall I curse <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, whom 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> hath not cursed <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? or how shall I defy <S%H2194><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, whom the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not defied <S%H2194><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ?

For from the top <S%H7218><s%> of the rocks <S%H6697><s%> I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and from the hills <S%H1389><s%> I behold <S%H7789><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him: lo, the people <S%H5971><s%> shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> alone <S%H910><s%>, and shall not be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> <S%H8691><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

Who can count <S%H4487><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, and the number <S%H4557><s%> of the fourth <S%H7255><s%> part of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>? Let me die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5315><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of the righteous <S%H3477><s%>, and let my last <S%H319><s%> end be like his!

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, What hast thou done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto me? I took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee to curse <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8800><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and, behold, thou hast blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> them altogether <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Must I not take heed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> that which the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%> ?

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, with me unto another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, from whence thou mayest see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them: thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> but <S%H657><s%> the utmost <S%H7097><s%> part of them, and shalt not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them all: and curse <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me them from thence.

And he brought <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him into the field <S%H7704><s%> of Zophim <S%H6839><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, to the top <S%H7218><s%> of Pisgah <S%H6449><s%>, and built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Stand <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8690><s%> here <S%H3541><s%> by thy burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, while I meet <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8735><s%> the YY yonder <S%H3541><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8735><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thus.

And when he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, behold, he stood <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8737><s%> by his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> with him. And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What hath the YY <S%H3068><s%> spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> ?

And he took up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his parable <S%H4912><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, Balak <S%H1111><s%>, and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; hearken <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto me, thou son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor <S%H6834><s%>:

'Elohim <S%H410><s%> is not a man <S%H376><s%>, that he should lie <S%H3576><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; neither the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, that he should repent <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8691><s%>: hath he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and shall he not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it? or hath he spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and shall he not make it good <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8686><s%> ?
Behold, I have received <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Mitzvah to bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%>: and he hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%>; and I cannot reverse <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it.

He hath not beheld <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8689><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> in Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, neither hath he seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> perverseness <S%H5999><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: the YY <S%H3068><s%> his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is with him, and the shout <S%H8643><s%> of a king <S%H4428><s%> is among them.
'Elohim <S%H410><s%> brought them out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; he hath as it were the strength <S%H8443><s%> of an unicorn <S%H7214><s%>.

Surely there is no enchantment <S%H5173><s%> against Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, neither is there any divination <S%H7081><s%> against Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: according to this time <S%H6256><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> and of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, What hath 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> wrought <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> !

Behold, the people <S%H5971><s%> shall rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as a great lion <S%H3833><s%>, and lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself as a young lion <S%H738><s%>: he shall not lie down <S%H7901><s%> <S%H8799><s%> until he eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the prey <S%H2964><s%>, and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Neither curse <S%H5344><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them at all <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, nor bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them at all <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

But Balaam <S%H1109><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Told <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> not I thee, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, All that the YY <S%H3068><s%> speaketh <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, that I must do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balaam <S%H1109><s%>, Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, I will bring <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee unto another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; peradventure it will please <S%H3474><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H5869><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> that thou mayest curse <S%H6895><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me them from thence.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> brought <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> unto the top <S%H7218><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%>, that looketh <S%H8259><s%> <S%H8737><s%> toward <S%H6440><s%> Jeshimon <S%H3452><s%>.

And Balaam <S%H1109><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Balak <S%H1111><s%>, Build <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8798><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%>, and prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me here seven <S%H7651><s%> bullocks <S%H6499><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> rams <S%H352><s%>.

And Balak <S%H1111><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as Balaam <S%H1109><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a bullock <S%H6499><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> on every altar <S%H4196><s%>.
